Affiliations

Current
  • I serve as head of software development at Hypermath project at MCCME. We do Hypermath, Math trainings and complex content management system for creating educational content in mathematics for Russian schools.
  • I study mathematics at HSE faculty of mathematics. My advisors in chronological order: Alexey L. Gorodentsev, Anton Ayzenberg, and Andrey Trepalin.
Past

I used to:

  • study computer science at MSU faculty of computational mathematics and cybernetics.
  • work as software developer at GetShop.TV.
  • work as research intern at HSE laboratory for Algebraic Topology and applications being involved into theoretical work behind research on ability to recover geometry of the room by activity of place cells in mouse brain.
  • work as intern software developer at SmartDec.
  • study biology and bioinformatics at AESC MSU. Advisor: Oleg Koliasnikov.

Open source projects

  • dbmonitor — tool to perform consistency checks on Postgres databases. Supports hot swap of any part of configuration.
  • changelogged — changelog manager for git projects.
  • LaTeX-numbers — formatting autocorrection tool for LaTeX. Rules are taken based on rules of MCCME publishing.
